question: Who has been recently conferred with the ‘Harit Ratna Award 2019’ in the field of Agriculture?
explanation:
The Vice chancellor of Tamil Nadu Agricultural University, has been conferred ‘Harit Ratna Award 2019’ by the All India Agricultural Students Association. The award was presented during 5th National Youth Convention at Indira Gandhi Krishi Vishwavidyalaya, which was held in Raipur.
HE has been selected for the award for distribution of ₹30-crore entrepreneurship project in agri-business and for motivating students to the agriculture sector in the State. He was instrumental in developing and signing MoU with several universities for students exchange and research programmes.
